page.para: Vi/na and Vi/nay have fun with paint!
Vi/na and Vi/nay are play/ing in the gar/den.
Two work/men are paint/ing the wall.
Vi/na and Vi/nay want to help.
Vi/na and Vi/nay de/cide to paint the gate.
Af/ter/wards there is a lot to clean up!
Do you like Vi/na’s red gate?
Do you like Vi/nay’s green gate?
Mum likes both sides of the gate!
